description: A tiny, flickering mote of elemental energy, the Spark of Creation is a living embodiment of raw potential. It crackles with arcane energy, ready to ignite into greater forms or inspire creation in those who come into contact with it.

traits.name: Inspiration Aura
traits.description: Creatures within 10 feet of the Spark of Creation have advantage on saving throws against fear and gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) force damage.

actions.name: Ignite Potential
actions.description: The Spark of Creation can touch a willing creature, infusing them with arcane energy. The creature gains 1d6 temporary hit points and can reroll one failed attack roll, ability check, or saving throw within the next hour.
